description: Chris is a bisexual guy who decided he wanted to take a walk on the wild side and approached a buddy with a camera - and that buddy sent in the tape to us. When he pulled those Speedos down, he was rock hard and already with steady drip of precum that didn't stop. A former college swimmer, Chris never got over his attraction to lycra as he worse purple Speedos under his clothing and could not wait to show them off. As a matter of fact, showing off is an opportunity he had been dying to do and since he waited 31 years to do it, he made the most of the opportunity. He seemed to glow as the camera went up and down his body as that b
title: Chris The Movie
